  aria-labelledby attribute is not well supported on a div with no valid role attribute.

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  user-scalable=no on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
source: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale = 1.0, user-scalable = no">

help: All page content should be contained by landmarks
